snippet: The move by the United States Navy intended to balance a renewed American emphasis on the Asia-Pacific region while sustaining a military presence in the Middle East to deter Iran.
abstract: United States Navy officials say that it is rushing more of newest unmanned mine-clearing technology to Persian Gulf while creating two new sets of crew to operate mine sweepers in region; effort is intended to balance renewed American emphasis on Asia Pacific region while sustaining military presence in Middle East to deter Iran.
lead_paragraph: The move by the United States Navy intended to balance a renewed American emphasis on the Asia-Pacific region while sustaining a military presence in the Middle East to deter Iran.

headline.seo: Navy Sends More Robotic Mine-Clearing Systems to Persian Gulf
headline.main: Navy Rushes Robotic Tools to Clear Mines to Persian Gulf
headline.print_headline: Navy Rushes To Persian Gulf Robotic Tools To Clear Mines

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
